column3: I believe univalue/gen.cpp needs to be updated and run to re-generate this, no? I assume you just hand-edited this, but we should still ensure that it's still producing correct output.\n

@theuni: Meh. Thanks! Wasn't aware of that. Fixed the `gen.cpp` file, `gcc gen.cpp`, `./a.out > univalue_escapes.h`. The resulted file gave no changes to my manually edited file. The updated `gen.cpp` is now also included in this PR.\n
Added covering for this escaping issue in `univalue_tests.cpp`.\n
